person.persName: Richard L. Peyton (Hopkins County farm laborer and soldier)

body.p: A Kentucky farm laborer and soldier. Lived in Hopkins County, Kentucky on the family farm in 1860. Served as a second lieutenant in the 25th Kentucky Infantry (Co. D), which consolidated into the 17th Kentucky Infantry (Co. E), from January 1862 to April 1862. Commissioned a lieutenant colonel for Hopkins County in 1863.
